title: Catalytic recycling of PET waste bottles into a value-added amide monomer using a heterogeneous niobium pentoxide nanocatalyst
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01136H, Paper
Bhattu Swapna, Suresh Babu Putla, Asha Ramesh, Challapalli Subrahmanyam, Giridhar Madras, Putla Sudarsanam
A solution combustion synthesized Nb2O5 nanocatalyst, consisting of strong acid sites, more oxygen vacancies, and a unique morphology, showed higher catalytic efficiency in the chemical recycling of PET waste into a valuable monomer.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
